alert.note: Alert for Coastal Georgetown; Inland Georgetown; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 10:30AM EST until January 22 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Periods of freezing rain will result in total ice accumulations ranging between 0.05 to 0.20 inches. The freezing rain may mix with or change to a period of sleet and or snow prior to ending early Saturday morning. A trace of snow accumulation is possible. * WHERE...Williamsburg, Inland Georgetown and Coastal Georgetown Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The forecast ice accumulations will make traveling hazardous. Scattered power outages and tree damage may occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Conditions will worsen through the afternoon as temperatures drop to around freezing, and areas of light freezing rain expand from south to north.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
